sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router"; import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const CarDetail = () => { const [car, setCar] = useState('') const { id } = useParams(); const getSingleCar = async () => { const { data } = await axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8000/${id}`) console.log(data) setCar(data) } useEffect(() => { getSingleCar(); } , []) return (

car detail

Year: {car.year}

Date creation Pub: {car.date}

  • Price :

    {car.price}

  • Kilometrage:

    {car.mileage}

  • Date :

    {car.date}

  • Color :

    {car.colou}

  • Doors Number :

    {car.doors_number}

  • Fuel Type :

    {car.fuel_type}

  • Transmission :

    {car.Transmission}

  • Body Type :

    {car.body_type}

  • Engine Size :

    {car.engine_size}

  • Description:

    {car.description}

Update
) } export default CarDetail;
